alert.note: Alert for Coastal Willacy; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 12:48PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Willacy County through 115 PM CDT... At 1248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Porfirio, or 8 miles northwest of Arroyo City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Mansfield, Port Mansfield Chamber Of Commerce and Port Mansfield Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. Theis type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
